# Getting Started in Our Research Group

We're so thrilled that you've decided to join us at our research group at UVA! In this section, we'll outline some useful tips/steps that will help you get situated within our group specifically. Note that you should keep an eye out on instructions from the Department and UVA!

## 6 to 3 Months Before Arriving at UVA

+--------------------------------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| Task                                                         | Resources/Notes                                                                                                                                                                   |
+==============================================================+===================================================================================================================================================================================+
| -   Start looking into housing options for the upcoming term | -   UVA Off Grounds Housing [Page](https://offgroundshousing.student.virginia.edu/): a decent place to look at listings                                                           |
|                                                              | -   More aggregated [resources](https://www.law.virginia.edu/charlottesville/housing)                                                                                             |
+--------------------------------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| -   Confirm logistics for moving to UVA                      | -   We have some resources to defray *a portion* of the moving costs for non-local students at the lab. Please check with Fred to see what is available and get things in writing |
+--------------------------------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
